citethispage-desc: O l'azonze 'na paggina speciale pe-e [[Special:CiteThisPage|çitaçioin]] e 'n ingancio inti strumenti
tooltip-citethispage: Informassioin sciu comme çitâ questa paggina
citethispage-badrevision: Errô: no l'è stæto trovou arcun-a verscion pe-a paggina "$1" con ID verscion $2.
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== Detaggi bibliograffichi pe {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Tittolo paggina: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Aotô: contributoî {{SITENAME}} * Editô: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Dæta de l'urtima modiffica: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Dæta estraçion: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * URL permanente: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * ID verscion paggina: {{REVISIONID}}
== Stili çitaçioin pe {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[APA style|Stile APA]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Estræto o {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} da {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[The MLA style manual|Stile MLA]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide|Stile MHRA]] === Contributoî {{SITENAME}}, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [accesso o {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|Stile Chicago]] === Contributoî {{SITENAME}}, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (accesso o {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|Stile CBE/CSE]] === Contributoî {{SITENAME}}. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [çitou o {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Disponibile insce: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Stile Bluebook]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (urtima vixita o {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[BibTeX]] entry === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Online; accesso o {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Quande s'adoeuvia o pachetto [[LaTeX]] pe url (\usepackage{url} da quarche parte into preambolo) ch'o tende a dà di adressi web formatæ de 'na mainea ben ciu bella, l'è preferibile doeuviâ sto coddiçe: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Online; accesso o {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
